item.title: How can i add this (explain in detail please)
item.dc:creator: @Harleyscape_owner Harleyscape owner
item.description:
@Harleyscape_owner wrote:

well this is from Frugoo scape so i take no credits of his work, but i can’t get it to work keep getting errors, well here it is:

Change your appendPlayerChatText(stream str) { to this:

protected void appendPlayerChatText(stream str) { str.writeWordBigEndian(((chatTextColor&0xFF) << 8) + (chatTextEffects&0xFF)); str.writeByte(playerRights); str.writeByteC(chatTextSize); // no more than 256 bytes!!! String temp = misc.textUnpack(chatText, chatTextSize); String temp2 = censorStr(temp); misc.textPack(chatText, temp2); str.writeBytes_reverse(chatText, chatTextSize, 0); }

Add this String i made for you:

[code]String censorStr(String original) {
original.trim();
original.toLowerCase();
int z = 0;

String badWordAt[] = new String [1000];
//check if any bad word is in the array
while(badWords[z] != "endOfArray"){

int i = original.indexOf(badWords[z]);

if (badWords[z] == “endOfArray”){
return original;
}
if (i < 0) {
z++;
}else{

String partBefore = original.substring(0, i);
String partAfter  = original.substring(i + badWords[z].length());
String replacement = "";
for(int m =0; m > badWords[z].length(); m++){
	replacement = replacement+"*";
}
original = partBefore + replacement + partAfter;
z=0;
}

}[/code]

Here are the bad words in an array:

public String badWords[] = {"Shit","Fuck","ass","boobs","pussy","dick","cock","dildo","endOfArray"};

Read full topic
